sources.title: Stampede
sources.description: Stevens (J.P. McGowan) is after the Milford ranch and is keeping away all cattle buyers so Milford (Le Strange Millman) will be unable to pay off his note. Buyer Larry Carson (Charles Starrett) arrives and avoids the attempts on his life. When Larry fouls up Stevens attempt to destroy Milford's herd, he rescues one of the henchmen who confesses. Larry learns Stevens is the culprit and the evidence is in his safe. He must now find a way to get into Stevens' safe.

metadata.Plot: Stevens is after the Milford ranch and is keeping away all cattle buyers so Milford will be unable to pay off his note. Buyer Larry Carson arrives and avoids the attempts on his life. When Larry fouls up Stevens attempt to destroy Milford's herd, he rescues one of the henchmen who confesses. Larry learns Stevens is the culprit and the evidence is in his safe. He must now find a way to get into Stevens' safe.
metadata.Actors: Charles Starrett, Finis Barton, J.P. McGowan
